column6: WHAT - any object, physical or virtual
WHEN something occurs - scheduled ETL jobs, key dates
WHO - a person, user, owner of running task
WHY - information such as filters, areas, descriptive details - to show reasons things are done
(glue) A Link or relationship between any ontology item (uses, updates, related)
Project with one or many tasks
Task to do - either automated by PC or manual
A Filter applied to data (usually from category)
A list of information for reference files
A piece of information - can be a word, sentence, paragraph
run a program (any languange) on PC, phone or database

column5: URL to Website, Folder or File
column6: A link to a File, Folder or Website (UNC)
a list of categories to allow for filtering / grouping
